definition: to be reborn/rebirth
heavy/serious/to attach importance to
to repeat/repetition/again/re-/classifier: layer
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to rise from the ashes (idiom)/to thrive again after surviving an ordeal

sentences.english: Mayhap , they will rebirth the soul of a nation.
sentences.chinese: 也許，一個國家的靈魂也會因此重生。

sentences.english: The renewal leads to a syncronistic dream accolade of achievement.
sentences.chinese: 重生，會帶來榮曜夢想成就的同步。

sentences.english: The reverse is experiencing rebirth or healing.
sentences.chinese: 相反的情景是重生或傷病痊癒。

sentences.english: Being born of the Spirit means much more than we generally take it to mean.
sentences.chinese: 從聖靈重生的意味，遠遠深於我們平常所認識的。

sentences.english: But hard work and devotion regains the gardens beauty and gives it life again.
sentences.chinese: 但是艱苦的工作和付出使花草重新獲得美麗和重生。

sentences.english: Added respawn time advantages when a team begins to cap any point.
sentences.chinese: 新增重生時間的優勢時，開始第一個團隊的任何一點。

sentences.english: The Carolingian empire was considered a rebirth of the culture of the Roman Empire.
sentences.chinese: 他統治下的加洛林王朝被認爲是羅馬文明的重生。

sentences.english: Such a rebirth is impossible as long as you continue to project or miscreate.
sentences.chinese: 只要你繼續妄自投射或造作，就沒有重生的可能。

sentences.english: Now, I'm humbly appealing to you for a brand new start.
sentences.chinese: 現在，我謙卑地請求您能我一個全新的重生機會。

sentences.english: You can no longer destroy the "Respawn" dialog box.
sentences.chinese: 你無法再破壞重生提示框。
古埃及人相信轉世重生嗎？

sentences.english: Amazing special effects bring a vast variety of fantastic creatures to life.
sentences.chinese: 驚人特效讓各式各樣珍禽異獸重生。

sentences.english: Each time, the financial sector rose, phoenix-like, from the ashes.
sentences.chinese: 每一次，金融業都像鳳凰般浴火重生。

sentences.english: Ashes of new homes, is gathering a new hope.
sentences.chinese: 浴火重生的新家園，正匯聚升騰起新的希望。

sentences.english: What we need is the courage of self-reform and regeneration of the determination of …
sentences.chinese: 我們需要的是自我革新的勇氣，決定的重生。

sentences.english: Keeping the same posture till next birth.
sentences.chinese: 我將保持同樣的姿態直到終老，重生。

definition: to revive/(lit. and fig.) to come back to life/(religion) resurrection
to be reborn/to recover/to come back to life/to regenerate
to rise from the ashes (idiom)/to thrive again after surviving an ordeal
nirvana (Buddhism)
variant of 輪迴|轮回[lun2 hui2]
reincarnation (Buddhism)
to come to/to awaken/to regain consciousness
variant of 盤|盘/wooden tray
to transform/to morph/to degenerate/metamorphosis/transmutation/transformation/decay/degeneration
to shed one's mortal body and exchange one's bones (idiom); born again Daoist/to turn over a new leaf/fig. to change wholly/to create from other material (story, artwork etc)
corporeal body
to awaken/to come to realize/awakened to the truth/the truth dawns upon one/scales fall from the eyes/to become aware
to save (a soul)/redemption
to rise from the dead (idiom); fig. an unexpected recovery
this life/to lose face/to be disgraced
new/newborn/emerging/nascent/rebirth/regeneration/new life/new student
